Package io.netty.handler.codec.spdy

Class SpdyFrameEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.spdy.SpdyFrameEncoder
  • public class SpdyFrameEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Encodes a SPDY Frame into a ByteBuf.
